availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Titus Bennett Chandler (Mason County, Kentucky, saddler)

body.p: Mason County, Kentucky, saddler. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Ann Wender Chandler in Mason County on October 2, 1843. Father of Thomas R. Chandler, John J. Chandler, William L. Chandler, Christopher C. Chandler, Franklin P. Chandler, Mary C. Chandler, Richard Chandler, Charles B. Chandler. Saddler in Fleming County in 1850. Employed Joshua Teagen in 1850. Saddler in Mason County in 1860. Employed Thomas R. Chandler in 1860.
